'''''Semnai Sans Shadow''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must complete the {{Quest|The Wild Fairy of Erinnyes}} and open all the treasures [[Pahsiv]] gives at the end.

==Trivia==
* "Semnai" is the honorific for {{w|Erinyes}}, the {{w|chthonic}} deities of vengeance in Ancient Greek religion and mythology.
